subject: SSPE update Tuesday, May 29th 2007
body:
To view this email as a web page, go    here.     



The Bull ReportMay 29th, 2007If you saw UFC 71 and the excitement at the sold out MGM Grand on Saturday, you know that Mixed Martial Arts (MMA) is popular, main stream, and taking the country by storm.The frenzied crowd at the MGM Grand was reminiscent of the days of Tyson vs. Holyfield.  SSPE offers the opportunity to get in on the ground-floor of this highly lucrative MMA phenomenon.
SSPE, announced last Friday that it will be the first Mixed Martial Arts (MMA) Events and Production Company for the upcoming $5 Billion Ultimate Resorts Project in Las Vegas, NV.Read the full report on SSPERead the full disclaimer 
Click here
